thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com
thread.title: Kevin C
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses USA reviewed by Kevin C

author: Kevin C
title: Kevin C
text: First pair of Maui Jim sunglasses where out of stock. I keep waiting for that pair for a while. During the time I was waiting I called smartbuy and spoke to customer service a few times and each time they were very helpful. I decided to go with another pair of Maui Jim's that were in stock and they over nighted them to me at no extra charge and even took 5% off that pair of glasses! They I'll be my go to place to purchase glasses in the future.
